snippet: The death toll in four days of clashes in northern Yemen rose, one of the clans said, as the government tried to broker a cease-fire in a region that is largely outside its control.
abstract: At least 55 people die in four days of fighting between Shiite Houthi rebels and Sunni Salafis in Yemen's Saada Province.
lead_paragraph: The death toll in four days of clashes in northern Yemen rose, one of the clans said, as the government tried to broker a cease-fire in a region that is largely outside its control.

headline.main: At Least 55 Die as Rival Sects Clash in Yemen
headline.print_headline: At Least 55 Die As Rival Sects Clash in Yemen
